allodb
  • Datasets
  • news
  • fgeo

allodb: Allometric equations from ForestGEO’s sites

The goal of allodb is to develop, host and give access to tables of allometric equations for ForestGEO’s network.

Installation

To install allodb run the following code in R (but see the note below):

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("forestgeo/allodb", auth_token = "abc")

NOTES:

  • For details on how to install from private repositories see this article.
  • For general advice on installing packages from GitHub see this article.

Example

library(allodb)
library(tibble)

equations
#> # A tibble: 419 x 14
